https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wC0ax12N9GQ8vMXPEs4nES5AAiB.jpg Millionaire industrialist Steven Taylor is a man who has everything but what he craves most: the love and fidelity of his wife. A hugely successful player in the New York financial world, he considers her to be his most treasured acquisition. But she needs more than simply the role of dazzling accessory. A Perfect Murder
